Je suis développeur web fullstack depuis: I have been a fullstack web developer since 2023, following a career start in Finance.
J'ai obtenu mon master en finance à l'un: I earned my master's degree in Finance from the University of Paris-Dauphine in 2020, completing internships at major banks in France and abroad, as well as a semester exchange in the USA.
C'est durant mon stage de fin d'études d: I discovered the profession of a developer during my end-of-studies internship at a startup named Okarito.
Après un premier CDI de deux ans en tant: After having worked two years as a financial analyst at an asset management company, I chose to transition into web development by undertaking a rigorous six-month intensive training program at Openclassrooms. I now hold the title of Web Integration Developer and have already worked on several projects utilizing technologies such as Javascript, React, Node.js, Express.js, and Mongoose.
